headline: Show HN: A sample chapter of my book about ALS research
description:
I am not a scientist, not even an English native speaker, but a few years ago I wrote a book about the state of research on a motor neuron disease: ALS (aka Lou Gehrig's disease).

I would deeply appreciate any comment or advice on a sample chapter of this book. This sample chapter (45 pages) deals with current efforts on replacing or healing motor neurons.

It is available here: https://padiracinnovation.org/en/ALS/ALS_FSTDTRMF-v32_en_partial.pdf

Thanks!

description_zh-Hans:
我不是科学家，甚至不是英语母语者，但几年前我写了一本关于运动神经元疾病研究状况的书。

如果您对本书的一个样本章节有任何意见或建议，我将深表感谢。这一章样本（45页）涉及目前在替换或治疗运动神经元方面的努力。

它可以在这里找到：https://padiracinnovation.org/en/ALS/ALS_FSTDTRMF-v32_en_partial.pdf

谢谢!
